posts.post_title: for sale: cabinet photo of Columbia players
posts.post_content:
Posted By: bcornell
Photo of 2 Columbia players on 7" x 9" backing.  I believe this is a 19th c. photo judging by the uniforms and gloves, although it could be early 20th c.

Sold

Bill
